DataElement.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Pain Interference PAININ22 Past 7 Days How Much Did Pain Interfere with Work Around the Home Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Person's stated response of how much in the past 7 days pain interfered with with work around the home, using a five-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain Pain Interference Subordinate Domain Past Week How Much Did Pain Interfere with Work Around the Home Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health._The collection of PROMIS item scales that assess the consequences of pain on relevant aspects of a person's life, including the impact of pain on social, cognitive, emotional, physical, and recreational activities as well as sleep and enjoyment in life._The most recent week, including today._A question about how much a person's pain interferes or interfered with their work around the home._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain Pain Interference Subordinate Domain
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health.:The collection of PROMIS item scales that assess the consequences of pain on relevant aspects of a person's life, including the impact of pain on social, cognitive, emotional, physical, and recreational activities as well as sleep and enjoyment in life.

Concepts.definition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health.

The collection of PROMIS item scales that assess the consequences of pain on relevant aspects of a person's life, including the impact of pain on social, cognitive, emotional, physical, and recreational activities as well as sleep and enjoyment in life.

Property.preferredName: Past Week How Much Did Pain Interfere with Work Around the Home Score
Property.preferredDefinition: The most recent week, including today.:A question about how much a person's pain interferes or interfered with their work around the home.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.

Concepts.longName: How Much Did Pain Interfere with Work Around the Home
Concepts.definition: A question about how much a person's pain interferes or interfered with their work around the home.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: PROMIS:Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System, PROMIS Health Organization and PROMIS Cooperative Group, 2008-2012
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Alliance A011401 study in Rave per request by K.Allen-Ziegler. mc 2/17/16

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used with the PROMIS items that describes a range of subjective scores for representing how much of something an individual experiences from 1: Not at all, to 5: Very much.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of strong agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a great amount or extent.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created for ECOG-ACRIN study in Rave. mc 5/4/15
